title: Unable to craft championship shyvana gold chroma
body:
Pretty much as the title suggests i'm unable to craft the chroma, I have the right amount of tokens and I've restarted the client twice
I just wanna play my favourite dragon in gold {{item:3070}} {{champion:102}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
You aren't the only one having the issue, I'm trying to do some digging to see if anyone knows anything, but in the meantime I'd recommend submitting a ticket to Player Support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

They'll be able to pass it onto the people who can fix it if it's going to become a widespread issue.
